definition: to be involved in politics/participation in politics
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

definition: imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
to accuse of misconduct (in official task)/to impeach
Minister of Revenue (from the Han dynasty onwards)
